import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "../../../axios"; export default class ViewModal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { stock_id: [] }; } componentDidMount() { axios .get("/api/values/purchaseDetails/" + this.props.match.params.id) .then(response => { if (response.data) this.setState({ stock_id: response.data }); console.log(response.data); }) .catch(error => console.log(error)); } render() { return ( <>

Stock: {this.state.stock_id.Pur_Agmt}

); } }
